text: @ciarakellydoc Cue the begrudgers as usual 🙄. Said it already I’m a card carrying @labour and  @labourwomen executive member, I deferred my retirement indefinitely and I’m proud of @HSELive and political leadership being shown right now by @LeoVaradkar @SimonHarrisTD and @simoncoveney #COVID19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
